job.description: ltstronggtMachine Learning Engineer  Python C JulialtbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis Jobot Job is hosted by Gene ChoiltbrgtltbrgtAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtSalary 150000  200000 per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtA Bit About UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtBased in Boston MA we use light to create photonic compute chips specialized for AI We recently secured our Series B funding of 80MltbrgtltbrgtIf you are a Machine Learning Engineer then please read onltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt Competitive Base Salaryltligtltligt 401k PTO and excellent benefitsltligtltligt Accelerated Career GrowthltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob DetailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtIs your background a fit Apply if you meet this criterialtbrgtltulgtltligt Masters or PhD in computer science electrical engineering physics mathematics or any related fieldltligtltligt Minimum of 5 years experience in software engineering for machine learning applicationsltligtltligt Highly proficient in scientific objectoriented programming languages eg Python C and Julia with good code hygieneltligtltligt Solid understanding of artificial intelligence machine learning and neural networksltligtltligt Highly experienced in deep learning programming languages and framework eg Tensorflow PyTorch Caffe MXNetltligtltligt Experience programming in CUDA or OpenCL is a plusltbrgtltligtltulgtInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button
